attributes.action: Brexit must not continue until the UK government admit what stage we're at.
attributes.background: Our government is not admitting to what stage we're at with Brexit, and Theresa May is avoiding discussion. The people have no confidence in her government, and we demand that she make it public what stage we're at with the negotiations before she is allowed to continue with leaving the EU.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. The Government regularly releases information about the progress of the exiting the EU negotiations. You can find out more here:

https://www.gov.uk/government/news/programme-eu-uk-article-50-negotiations-brussels-16-to-19-march-2018

https://www.gov.uk/government/collections/article-50-and-negotiations-with-the-eu

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
